channel.title: [RS2] Solemn Wishes Powerminer
channel.description:
[left] [RS2] Solemn Wishes Powerminer
v 1.0.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
by Solemn Wishes contact: Rune-nation@hotmail.co.uk
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
A Script That Will Mine Any Rock That You Select And Once The Inventory Is Full It Will Then Drop All Ores From The Inventory. This Script uses The Latest SRL and is fitted with a custom world switcher It Also Has A custom Responder And Lots Of Other Anti-Ban Features.
----------------------------------------------------------------------- Instructions. -----------------------------------------------------------------------
1. USE Runescape with low Detail, Very Bright. 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. 3. Set Playernames, Passwords ect ect ect 4. Have pickaxe in first inventory slot or equipted 5. setup from lines 79 - 85 ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Features ----------------------
. Plays a windows sound on random events . Custom world switchign and player counting . Very fast mining . Auto detects the client window . Three custom antiban procedures . Custom auto responder . Two different mining procedures . Auto colour . soon to also be a banker...
----------------------------------------------------------------------- Reports -
[code]Solemn wishes Powerminer Version 1.0 release beta - Mining test Please enjoy your mining experience...
Scar client Located RuneScape game Screen found by size W=766 H=504 Mine MM symbol Color:= 1974304 Currently Searching for : tin ore Rock Found in Aproximatly: 609: mili seconds
Worked for 6 Hours, 35 Minutes and 41 Seconds this session mined 3753 ore so far Gained around 67554 mining exp so far. <=====================================================> There are 6 players in this area Rock Found in Aproximatly: 1062: mili seconds Successfully executed [/code] [code] Solemn wishes Powerminer Version 1.0 release beta - Mining test Please enjoy your mining experience...
Scar client Located RuneScape game Screen found by size W=766 H=504 Mine MM symbol Color:= 1974304 Currently Searching for : tin ore Rock Found in Aproximatly: 609: mili seconds
Worked for 1 Hours, 35 Minutes and 41 Seconds this session mined 511 ore[S] so far Gained around 7154 mining exp so far. <=====================================================> There are 6 players in this area Rock Found in Aproximatly: 1062: mili seconds Successfully executed[/code]
[code]Successfully compiled SRL Compiled in 2141msec.
Solemn wishes Powerminer Version 1.0 release beta - Mining test Please enjoy your mining experience...
Scar client Located RuneScape game Screen found by size W=766 H=504 Mine MM symbol Color:= 1974304 Currently Searching for : tin ore Rock Found in Aproximatly: 953: mili seconds
Worked for 24 Minutes and 10 Seconds this session mined 111 ore[S] so far Gained around 1887 mining exp so far. <=====================================================> There are 6 players in this area Rock Found in Aproximatly: 313: mili seconds Successfully executed[/code]
----------------------------------------------------------------------- enjoy :D[/left]

Any help please?

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Solemn Wishes Powerminer
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

For those who cannot find the symbol, either
a). Move to a less crowded world
b). in the beginning of the main loop, put in

SymbolAccuracy := 0.4

if it doesnt work, lower the accuracy

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Solemn Wishes Powerminer
item.dc:creator: @mr.klean mr.klean
item.description:
@mr.klean wrote:

When you get the error the cursor in scar moves to that line and where the identifier is, put a 2 at the end of Rc like this ‘Rc2’
Repeat this for any other Rc Errors you get. Thats the error that i got and thats how i fixed it.
If any other errors i added you nerheim on msn and you can post them here

Read full topic
